svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

value="<p><b><font style="font-size: 12px;">(3) LLM Response 1</font></b>: Tools to be executed w/ information to pass to tools - Execute SIEM tool with MCP API details to identify end user devices as y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ej8hDgJhuvleFJYb6pgI-9" value="<b><font style="font-size: 14px;">SIEM MCP server tool</font></b>" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 638px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 121px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 139px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 150px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: (3) LLM Response 1: Tools to be executed w/ information to pass to tools - Execute SIEM tool with MCP API details to identify end user devices as per user policy

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 389px; margin-left: 201px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
(4) Agent Request: Match policy "ZTNA threat score < threshold for last x minutes"
(5) Server Response: list of devices

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 388px; margin-left: 501px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
(8) Agent Request: "Block VPN access" for device list
(9) Server Response: Successfully executed policy

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 388px; margin-left: 15px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 112px; height: 1px; padding-top: 184px; margin-left: 7px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: (2) Agent Prompt 1: User prompt + tools it supports - SIEM + ZTNA gateway with MCP schema

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: (6) Agent Prompt 2 : User prompt + tools it supports + list of devices from SIEM MCP server tool

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 123px; height: 1px; padding-top: 149px; margin-left: 446px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: (7) LLM Response 2: Tools to be executed w/ information to pass to tools - Execute ZTNA gateway tool with MCP API details to block traffic from offending devices

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 621px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 186px; margin-left: 761px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: (11) Final response from LLM: Action complete

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 145px; height: 1px; padding-top: 305px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p:
(1) User Prompt: Identify end user devices with ZTNA threat score < threshold for last x minutes and block VPN access
(12) Final response from LLM: Action complete
